content: the ezra headband is a textured ear warmer featuring a bold simple cable that looks beautiful from every angle it s a quick knit worked in worsted weight yarn on size 7 4 5mm needles and includes sizes from newborn through large adult making it perfect for the whole family the pattern is written row-by-row includes a cable chart and is beginner-friendly for anyone ready to try cables a great fast project for gifts winter wear or adding a stylish touch to your handmade wardrobe
